div.p: Procedure Outcome code: A selection of relevant SNOMED CT codes.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
Code
Display
385669000 Successful (qualifier value)
385671000 Unsuccessful (qualifier value)
385670004 Partially successful (qualifier value)
